title: Staples 78.4 Qt. Latch Lid Storage Bin, Clear (TR58307)
highlights: This storage bin will give you the extra storage you need in your office or home
Latch snaps easily in place to secure items inside

description.header: Maximize floor space with this Staples 78.4-quart storage tote.
description.paragraph: Rely on this clear, sturdy storage tote to keep items secure. With a 78.4-quart capacity, this container holds a variety of supplies. The latching lid maintains a firm grip to prevent contents from falling out, while built-in handles support easy lifting and transport. This Staples storage tote features sturdy plastic construction for lasting durability and a transparent design to easily identify the contents inside.
bullets: This storage bin will give you the extra storage you need in your office or home
Latch snaps easily in place to secure items inside
Stackable storage bin container for the odds and ends in your office. Indents in lids allow for storage boxes to stack neatly on one another
